DOC.brief_summary: Since influenza vaccine normally administer every year frequent change antigenic composition , safety immunogenicity profile adjuvanted influenza vaccine need re-evaluated repeat vaccine administration . In study , subject previously vaccinate Fluarix influenza adjuvanted vaccine , receive booster dose 2006-2007 season 's formulation either Fluarix adjuvanted vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Reactogenicity Immunogenicity Revaccination With Adjuvanted Influenza Vaccine Elderly
DOC.criteria: The subject must healthy elderly > /= 67 year previously vaccinate Fluarix adjuvanted vaccine . Subjects exclude take/have take chronically high dos immunosuppressant immunemodifying drug within six month vaccination , immunoglobulins blood product within three month vaccination , investigational product within 30 day vaccination , history influenza infection since previous vaccination , subject acute chronic clinically significant disease immunosuppressive/deficient condition , contraindication influenza vaccination
